property.name: cloudbase.zookeeper.host
property.description: comma seperated list of zookeeper servers

property.name: cloudbase.master.tabletserver.maxPastDelta
property.description: The amount of time a tablet servers time can lag behind the masters time. When a tablet servers time lags too much, the master will not assign tablets to it.

property.name: cloudbase.master.tabletserver.maxFutureDelta
property.description: The amount of time a tablets servers time can be ahead of the masters time. When a tablet server is too far ahead of the master, the master will not assign tablets to it.

property.name: cloudbase.directory
property.description: HDFS directory in which cloudbase instance will run

property.name: cloudbase.tabletserver.portSearch
property.description: if the ports above are in use, search higher ports until one is available

property.name: cloudbase.client.retries
property.description: The number of times to attempt to reconnect to a tablet server during a request
